welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bell, where small town charm meets big city adventure! Get ready to explore our lively downtown, try some delicious local cuisine, and immerse yourself in the rich history and culture of our beloved city. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here in Bell."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all Southwest Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Terminal C at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all JetBlue Airways flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves as the primary international terminal for LAX, with direct flights to destinations around the world.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used by Southwest Airlines for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is used by several airlines, including Delta and Air Canada, for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal is used by several airlines, including American Airlines and JetBlue, for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used by American Airlines for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used by American Airlines for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: This terminal is used by several airlines, including Alaska Airlines and Air Canada, for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal is used by several airlines, including United and Copa Airlines, for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used by United for both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights and houses a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bob Hope Airport, serving regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport is a small and cozy building, offering a comfortable waiting area for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For private charter flights, there is a separate terminal available at Cable Airport with luxurious amenities and personalized services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Chino Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
